name: latex-to-pdf
title: LaTeX to PDF Compiler
description: Compile LaTeX documents to PDF using pdflatex
content:
Overview

This application compiles LaTeX documents into PDF format using pdflatex. It automatically installs the necessary LaTeX distribution and runs the compilation process twice to ensure proper cross-references and table of contents generation.

Features

  • Compile LaTeX (.tex) to PDF format
  • Automatic texlive installation
  • Two-pass compilation for references
  • Automatic cleanup of auxiliary files

Parameters

  • LaTeX File: Upload your .tex file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a PDF file with the same base name as the input LaTeX file in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Compiling academic papers and theses
  • Generating technical documentation
  • Creating professional reports and presentations
  • Publishing scientific papers
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_${RANDOM}_${RANDOM}"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/latex_to_pdf.py" "${texPath}" -o "${outputDir}"
